revised_title: Investigations on Paramagnetism at Low Temperatures - Part II
tldr: The author, in collaboration with the late Prof. H. Kamerlingh Onnes, investigates paramagnetism at low temperatures. They determine the susceptibilities with an accuracy of about 1% using the Faraday method and a quartz microbalance. The experiments are conducted in a cryostat with liquid air as the cooling agent, and the results provide insights into the behavior of materials under extreme conditions.
